hiveArticle.title: This is my entry for the Monomad challenge - Wildlife
hiveArticle.body:
This Innocent looking monkey is not innocent I must say, they create a lot of problem for people traveling with bag or even water bottle.  I had to literally carry a stick to keep them away even though they tried to snatch my bag to see if I am carrying any food item or not.

![IMG_0973.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmUz3GaDSGhfESP3ACA8Bn31s78wqRSK24x1dv5FdFxJmb/IMG_0973.jpg)

Camera | Canon 200 D
--- | ---
Lens |  EF-S 18-55mm
Aperture | F/7.1
Exposure | 1/320
ISO | 100
